title.rendered: “Israeli Defense Forces Strike Hezbollah Military Bases in Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked military buildings of Hezbollah, a terrorist organization, in southern Lebanon.

Fighter jets recently attacked two military buildings of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Ithron and Ayta ash-Shab regions.

Yesterday (D’), in the evening hours, a military building of the organization in the Al-Matmura area and an observation post in the Al-Jibin area were attacked.

In recent hours, launches from Lebanese territory to Israeli territory have been identified in the areas of Rosh Hanikra, Ya’ara, and the Upper Galilee, the IDF struck artillery sources of the shooting.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/48Jq7l1
